item.title: Gotta Love/Hate Regex
item.description: I remember once calling regular expressions “absolute magic”. I do think it is powerful, but it kind of gets messy and unreadable when it gets bigger.

item.title: Text Analysis Phase 2: Python
item.description: I have been an R purist through my whole learning journey, but now I am picking up Python.

item.title: First Steps With Text Analysis
item.description: This is the beginning of experimentation with a new topic: text analysis!
